extendedInfo.description: Bailaqui will help you find the perfect places to go out dancing all around the world. Whether you love to dance Salsa, Bachata, Kizomba, Swing, Tango, ForrÃ³, Samba or Zouk, we can show you the clubs, festivals and parties where the social dancing is hot and the people are friendly. Need to learn to dance ? We will show you the local schools where you can learn many styles of latin dance. Want to go out dancing tonight ? Our location aware app will show you the nearest events that are happening right now. Our social tools help you meet new dancers and share your passion. You can show where you have been and who you danced with. Give your opinion on the music, the dancing, the floor, and much more. Are you a promoter ? Upload your event with our easy-to-use website. Our listings are available on the web, in our mobile apps, and in our Facebook app. One central place to reach a large audience of dancers.

reviews.title: Connect The Dance World
reviews.comment: It\'s an AMAZING APPS!!!  The most convenience thing is it got google map as well.  Highly recommend!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and useful
reviews.comment: Shows me a list of places to dance. Just what I wanted.  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
